title: getAuthStatus
description: Codex server method for retrieving current authentication status (JSON-RPC request/response).

includeToken.description: When true, include the active access token in the response

refreshToken.description: When true, trigger a refresh of the authentication token

authenticated.description: Indicates whether a user is currently authenticated

token.description: Active authentication token when includeToken is true

expiresAt.description: Expiration timestamp of the authentication token
